title: zyra champ shard ate 2880 Blue Essance twice
body: so i got zyra champ shard out of a level up capsol and i wanted to upgrade to perm but i got an error saying it failed and to restart client. when i did i tried again and got the same message but this time it took my blue essance for both tries. tyhis is kinda irrataing because i was going to play her now i have no BE to even buy her. please fix this fast. thanks have a nice day

replies.body: Hey I looked into this for you, and I can't add up what happened.  Your situation is very weird, so we want to investigate this further to see what happened.  When you get a chance, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can dig a big deeper and see if something might be going on.  Sorry for the hassle, we got your back though!
Thanks i was looking for the submit ticket link but i couldnt find it until right before i got your message. Thank you for getting back to me and i have sumitted a ticket. thanks again
